item.title: An insight into beautiful code
item.description: Through my journey as a software developer I have always cared for the aesthetics of my code; be the spacing between lines, naming conventions, or the structure of a project - much like a wordsmith or a sculptor - there is the pursuit of something beautiful, creative and expressive. Now that I think about it, though it can be intuitively understood, we struggle to describe beautiful code in a coherent set of qualities.
